revision.text:
{|class="infobox bordered" style="float:right; width:264px; font-size:90%; text-align:left; border:2px solid #404040; padding:3px;" cellpadding="3" |- !colspan="2" style="font-size:110%; text-align:center; background-color:#{{Dungeons color dark}}; color:#FFF;"|{{{name}}} |- {{#if:{{{image|}}} | {{!}} colspan="2" style="text-align:center;background-color:#FFF;" {{!}}{{{image}}}
{{#if:{{{caption|}}}|
{{{caption}}}}} {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{tokens|}}} | {{!}} style="background-color:#{{Dungeons color light}}; color:#000;" {{!}}'''Tokens needed''' {{!}}{{{tokens}}} {{Dungeontokens}} {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{location|}}} | {{!}} style="background-color:#{{Dungeons color light}}; color:#000;" {{!}}'''Location''' {{!}}{{{location}}} {{!}}- }}
|} == Code == 
{{Infobox Dungeon
|name    =
|image   =
|caption =
|tokens  =
|location =
}}
== Utilisation == Pour utiliser ce template, copiez le code ci-dessus en haut d'un article, et remplissez les valeurs respectives : '''Où :''' *name doit être rempli avec le nom du donjon. *image doit être rempli avec l'image du donjon, l'écran montré avant démarrage (attention, les images sont nommées d'après les noms anglais). *caption doit être rempli avec une description de l'image fournie. *tokens doit être rempli avec le nombre de Jetons de Donjons requis pour entrer dans le donjon. *location doit être rempli avec la localisation générale du donjon (par exemple la forêt de jade se trouve au nord de Jadielle sur la Route 2)

revision.text:
{|class="infobox bordered" style="float:right; width:264px; font-size:90%; text-align:left; border:2px solid #404040; padding:3px;" cellpadding="3" |- !colspan="2" style="font-size:110%; text-align:center; background-color:#{{Dungeons color dark}}; color:#FFF;"|{{{name}}} |- {{#if:{{{image|}}} | {{!}} colspan="2" style="text-align:center;background-color:#FFF;" {{!}}{{{image}}}
{{#if:{{{caption|}}}|
{{{caption}}}}} {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{tokens|}}} | {{!}} style="background-color:#{{Dungeons color light}}; color:#000;" {{!}}'''Tokens needed''' {{!}}{{{tokens}}} {{Dungeontokens}} {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{location|}}} | {{!}} style="background-color:#{{Dungeons color light}}; color:#000;" {{!}}'''Location''' {{!}}{{{location}}} {{!}}- }}
|} == Code == 
{{Infobox Dungeon
|name    =
|image   =
|caption =
|tokens  =
|location =
}}
== Utilisation == Pour utiliser ce template, copiez le code ci-dessus en haut d'un article, et remplissez les valeurs respectives :
'''Where:''' *name should be filled with the name of the dungeon. *image should be filled with the background image of the dungeon (from the screen before you start the dungeon). *caption should be filled with a description of the image spot. *tokens should be filled with the number of dungeon tokens needed to enter the dungeon. *location should be filled with the general location of the dungeon; i.e., Viridian Forest is north of Viridian City on Route 2.

{|class="infobox bordered" style="float:right; width:264px; font-size:90%; text-align:left; border:2px solid #404040; padding:3px;" cellpadding="3" |- !colspan="2" style="font-size:110%; text-align:center; background-color:#{{Dungeons color dark}}; color:#FFF;"|{{{name}}} |- {{#if:{{{image|}}} | {{!}} colspan="2" style="text-align:center;background-color:#FFF;" {{!}}{{{image}}}
{{#if:{{{caption|}}}|
{{{caption}}}}} {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{tokens|}}} | {{!}} style="background-color:#{{Dungeons color light}}; color:#000;" {{!}}'''Tokens needed''' {{!}}{{{tokens}}} {{Dungeontokens}} {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{location|}}} | {{!}} style="background-color:#{{Dungeons color light}}; color:#000;" {{!}}'''Location''' {{!}}{{{location}}} {{!}}- }}
|} == Code == 
{{Infobox Dungeon
|name    =
|image   =
|caption =
|tokens  =
|location =
}}
== Utilisation == Pour utiliser ce template, copier-coller le code ci-dessus en haut de la page et remplissez les valeurs des variables selon les règles suivantes :
'''Where:''' *name should be filled with the name of the dungeon. *image should be filled with the background image of the dungeon (from the screen before you start the dungeon). *caption should be filled with a description of the image spot. *tokens should be filled with the number of dungeon tokens needed to enter the dungeon. *location should be filled with the general location of the dungeon; i.e., Viridian Forest is north of Viridian City on Route 2.

revision.text:
{|class="infobox bordered" style="float:right; width:264px; font-size:90%; text-align:left; border:2px solid #404040; padding:3px;" cellpadding="3" |- !colspan="2" style="font-size:110%; text-align:center; background-color:#{{Dungeons color dark}}; color:#FFF;"|{{{name}}} |- {{#if:{{{image|}}} | {{!}} colspan="2" style="text-align:center;background-color:#FFF;" {{!}}{{{image}}}
{{#if:{{{caption|}}}|
{{{caption}}}}} {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{tokens|}}} | {{!}} style="background-color:#{{Dungeons color light}}; color:#000;" {{!}}'''Tokens needed''' {{!}}{{{tokens}}} {{Dungeontokens}} {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{location|}}} | {{!}} style="background-color:#{{Dungeons color light}}; color:#000;" {{!}}'''Location''' {{!}}{{{location}}} {{!}}- }}
|} == Code == 
{{Infobox Dungeon
|name    =
|image   =
|caption =
|tokens  =
|location =
}}
== Usage == To use this template, place the code above at the top of an article and fill in the respective blanks.
'''Where:''' *name should be filled with the name of the dungeon. *image should be filled with the background image of the dungeon (from the screen before you start the dungeon). *caption should be filled with a description of the image spot. *tokens should be filled with the number of dungeon tokens needed to enter the dungeon. *location should be filled with the general location of the dungeon; i.e., Viridian Forest is north of Viridian City on Route 2.

{{#if:{{{caption|}}}|
{{{caption}}}}} {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{tokens|}}} | {{!}} style="background-color:#{{Dungeons color light}}; color:#000;" {{!}}'''Tokens needed''' {{!}}{{{tokens}}} {{Dungeontokens}} {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{location|}}} | {{!}} style="background-color:#{{Dungeons color light}}; color:#000;" {{!}}'''Location''' {{!}}{{{location}}} {{!}}- }}
|}
== Code == 
{{Infobox Dungeon
|name    =
|image   =
|caption =
|tokens  =
|location =
}}
== Usage == To use this template, place the code above at the top of an article and fill in the respective blanks.
'''Where:''' *name should be filled with the name of the dungeon. *image should be filled with the background image of the dungeon (from the screen before you start the dungeon). *caption should be filled with a description of the image spot. *tokens should be filled with the number of dungeon tokens needed to enter the dungeon. *location should be filled with the general location of the dungeon; i.e., Viridian Forest is north of Viridian City on Route 2.
